# AudioResource.InputMode.ambient

**Case**

spatialized but ignores listener translation and only follows listener head rotation

## Declaration

```swift
case ambient
```

## Input modes

- **AudioResource.InputMode.nonSpatial**: the input channels are mixed to whatever the output format is without any spatialization
- **AudioResource.InputMode.spatial**: a spatialized with all degrees of freedom. This treats a resource as a mono stream so mixes all its channels to mono
